svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The number of cases of infectious diseases, World
Smallpox was declared eradicated in 1977, and Guinea worm and polio are on their way to be eradicated. While yaws
and dog-transmitted rabies could be eradicated, it is currently impossible for Malaria, Tuberculosis, and HIV/AIDS.
Source: WHO (2018), Tebbens et al. (2011), IHME (2016)
